db:abstract.db:para: The QRgbaFloat struct contains a four part RGBA floating-point color.
This class was introduced in Qt 6.2.

db:listitem.db:para: QRgbaFloat is part of Painting Classes

db:section.db:title: [alias] QRgbaFloat::FastType
db:section.db:para: Alias for float.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] quint8 QRgbaFloat::alpha8() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the alpha channel as an 8-bit.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] quint16 QRgbaFloat::alpha16() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the alpha channel as a 16-bit integer.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] float QRgbaFloat::alpha() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the alpha channel.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] float QRgbaFloat::alphaNormalized() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the alpha channel normalized to values between 0.0f and 1.0f.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] quint8 QRgbaFloat::blue8() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the blue color component as an 8-bit.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] quint16 QRgbaFloat::blue16() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the blue color component as a 16-bit integer.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] float QRgbaFloat::blue() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the blue color component.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] float QRgbaFloat::blueNormalized() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the blue color component normalized to values between 0.0f and 1.0f.

db:section.db:title: [static constexpr] QRgbaFloat<T> QRgbaFloat::fromArgb32(uint rgb)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QRgbaFloat value from the 32bit ARGB value rgb.

db:section.db:title: [static constexpr] QRgbaFloat<T> QRgbaFloat::fromRgba64(quint16 red, quint16 green, quint16 blue, quint16 alpha)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QRgbaFloat value from the four 16-bit integer color channels red, green, blue and alpha.

db:section.db:title: [static constexpr] QRgbaFloat<T> QRgbaFloat::fromRgba(quint8 red, quint8 green, quint8 blue, quint8 alpha)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QRgbaFloat value from the four 8-bit color channels red, green, blue and alpha.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] quint8 QRgbaFloat::green8() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the green color component as an 8-bit.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] quint16 QRgbaFloat::green16() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the green color component as a 16-bit integer.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] float QRgbaFloat::green() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the green color component.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] float QRgbaFloat::greenNormalized() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the green color component normalized to values between 0.0f and 1.0f.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] bool QRgbaFloat::isOpaque() const
db:section.db:para: Returns whether the color is fully opaque.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] bool QRgbaFloat::isTransparent() const
db:section.db:para: Returns whether the color is fully transparent.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] QRgbaFloat<T> QRgbaFloat::premultiplied() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the color with the alpha premultiplied.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] quint8 QRgbaFloat::red8() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the red color component as an 8-bit.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] quint16 QRgbaFloat::red16() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the red color component as a 16-bit integer.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] float QRgbaFloat::red() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the red color component.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] float QRgbaFloat::redNormalized() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the red color component normalized to values between 0.0f and 1.0f.

db:section.db:title: void QRgbaFloat::setAlpha(float alpha)
db:section.db:para: Sets the alpha of this color to alpha.

db:section.db:title: void QRgbaFloat::setBlue(float blue)
db:section.db:para: Sets the blue color component of this color to blue.

db:section.db:title: void QRgbaFloat::setGreen(float green)
db:section.db:para: Sets the green color component of this color to green.

db:section.db:title: void QRgbaFloat::setRed(float red)
db:section.db:para: Sets the red color component of this color to red.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] uint QRgbaFloat::toArgb32() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the color as a 32-bit ARGB value.

db:section.db:title: [constexpr] QRgbaFloat<T> QRgbaFloat::unpremultiplied() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the color with the alpha unpremultiplied.

db:section.db:title: QRgbaFloat16
db:section.db:para: A 64-bit data-structure containing four 16-bit floating point color channels: Red, green, blue and alpha.

db:section.db:title: QRgbaFloat32
db:section.db:para: A 128-bit data-structure containing four 32-bit floating point color channels: Red, green, blue and alpha.
